description: Complete system overview covering the mental health program directory architecture, key components, and high-level data flow
Detailed documentation of mental health program data models, including validation rules, required fields, relationships, and service area mappings
Comprehensive documentation of the program search and matching algorithms, including location-based matching, service area calculations, and crisis resource prioritization
Detailed documentation of all domain-specific validation rules for mental health programs, including crisis content handling, neutrality enforcement, and service categorization
Documentation of the program submission workflow, verification system, and data flow between components including rate limiting and security checks
